description:
Compete against your friends in a game of trivia (anyone can answer).
If no topic is given, a random one will be chosen.
The question will expire after 15 seconds.

errors.noValidTopic: Please provide a valid topic, use %%PREFIX%%topics for a list

messages.win: Congratulations %%WINNER%%, you gave the correct answer!
messages.lose: Sorry, time's up! Better luck next time.
